mapper.select: select nw.news_no, nw.title, nw.mno, m.mid, nw.cnts, nw.view_cnt, nw.news_date, nw.class_no from news nw, member m where nw.news_no = #{news_no} and nw.mno = m.mno
select q.qna_no, q.title, q.mno, m.mid, q.qna_cnts, q.view_cnt, q.qna_date from qna q, member m where q.qna_no = #{qna_no} and q.mno = m.mno
mapper.insert: insert into news ( title, mno, mid, class_no, cnts, view_cnt, news_date ) values ( #{title}, #{mno}, #{mid}, #{class_no}, #{cnts}, 0, now() )
insert into qna ( mno, mid, title, qna_cnts, qna_date, view_cnt ) values ( #{mno}, #{mid}, #{title}, #{cnts}, now(), 0 )
